reviews.review: super tare! :)

Fairly addicting game. I play both Survivor and Killer, and both roles give me a feeling no other games do. Your hearts starts pumpin and your mouth starts screamin. It's one of the best games in awhile.

This game is very fun to play especially with friends. Since the game is new it does have a lot of bugs but devs are working their butts of to fix them and I don't really notice them too much. Also the devs are updating the game a lot with new maps, clothes etc. Which is great! I rate this game 8/10! Pretty great game but I reccomend you wait a month or more for more content and less bugs :D

This is an amazing game. I have a lot of fun when I am playing this game. Devs are always patching and improving the game so even though game has some bugs and glitches, knowing that just makes you want to play more. 9/10
НОРМ

I really want to enjoy this game but for the last few weeks it has been completely unplayable for me. Steam says I have played for 13 hours in total, but at least 4 hours in the last two weeks have been spent stuck in the lobby - sometimes with friends and sometimes when trying to play on my own. I get that the game will have a few bugs and sometimes be unplayable but this is ridiculous, I feel like I've been cheated out of my money!

its a good game when it works! it usually takes atleast 2 minutes to find a game cuz the server is s%#t theres a bunch of bugs sometimes when the round starts you cant move and sometimes when the killer knocks you down and then he picks u up both of you cant move and sometimes the game crashes all together!!! hopefully they release an update with new maps and charactersand also fixs to these issues!

I really enjoy this game, it has some grind to it and it's definitely a skill-based game. You can play with friends or solo. There are a few bugs but they're working on most of the really important stuff. Worth the buy, especially for the price.
Sehr gutes Spiel !!!
Good Game !!!!

Sehr gutes Spiel was am Anfang ziemlich Nervenaufreibend war.  Nach ca 500 Spielstunden macht es immer noch ziemlich Spaß was am Anfang meine größte Sorge war, hat das Spiel einen langzeitigen Spielspaß, den ich mit einem großen JA beantworten kann. Im Spiel geht es grob gefasst um 4 Überlebenden und 1 Killer. Die Überlebenden müssen 5 Generatoren reparieren und entkommen. Das Spiel ist schlicht und einfach gehalten, was für den Preis vollkommen ok ist. Sehr schöne Maps, viele verschiedene Perks die jedem Spieler seinen eigenen Spielstyle spielen lassen können.
再不出新模式这游戏到头了

Я купил игру на 2 день после выхода, наиграл порядочно.За свои часы я убедился ,что эта загнется из за ленивых разрабов(которым насpать на все).Им только денег на кокс и шлюx подавай.С момента выхода игры не пофиксили практически ни один баг.Читеров больше чем в варфейсе.Оптимизацию не завезли(Пoхуй что ведьмак 3 на ультра идет)Тут ты получаешь 50 фпс на низких.За 2 месяца добавили охуенную локализацию ("шопот,найти выйти")+ ещё несколько шмоток.И самый главный минус.ЕБUЧИЕ ОКНА.ВСЕ АБУЗЯТ ОКНА И РАЗРАБАМ ПОХУЙ ЧТО ЭТО ЖЕСТКИЙ ДИСБАЛАНС НАДО ЕЩЁ НЕРФАНУТЬ МАНЬЯКОВ , А ТО ХYЛИ МЕДОМ ОБМАЗАЛИСЬ , НА ПО ЕbАЛУ,НАДО ПОРЕЗАТЬ ПЕРКИ ,А ТО ЧЕ УБЕГАЮТ ТОЛЬКО ПОЛОВИНА СУРВОВ , А НЕ 4 из 4

Que decir de este juego... pues sencillamente que si te gusta el escondite versión sangrienta, compralo sin dudarlo. Jugarlo en solitario es divertido pero se aprecia mas con amigos.La única pega que podría seria que le falta un sistema de reportes para cuando la gente se pica y se va de la partida. Algo que veo muy positivo sobretodo que esta en continua actualización y soluciones de errores.

Si quieres pasarlo bien con la adrenalina hasta arriba no lo dudes.

I played the beta and instantly loved it. I had pre-ordered it just before E3 2016 and while at the expo I was able to meet the team behind the game. These guys were just as excited about the game as I was. The devs are listening to the community too by balancing and adding things to the game that will make it more enjoyable for all. They also do a stream once in awhile to let the community know whats coming up, what they're working on, and any new or developing changes to the game. Matt, Ash and Dave love the stream btw guys! Amazing game for under $20. Don't sleep on this one steamers.
cool

Been playing this game for six years; the first game I played on my PC and then primarily played it on PS4 and PS5  - honestly one of my favourite horror games and my all-time favourite multiplayer game. Really nothing like it. Especially with licensed killers. Despite what people say there is nothing quite like a good chase as a survivor. Finally adding bots in custom matches later this year so you can even just chill out with yourself or some friends. 10/10.

Alors le jeu dans l'ensemble est très bien, l'idée est bonne, mais si vous voulez jouer avec vos amies oublier car on mais 15 a 20 minute pour trouvez une parti une horreur!!! une mise a jour pour régler le probleme est la se sera le top!
Other than the matchmaking problems, this game is tons of fun. Well worth $20, especially with the free dlc coming out this month and later on in the future.

I'm a hardcore gamer since 24 years and yet this is the first review, because this game is just worth it.

It has a depth which you would not dream of when you shortly see the game. The skill bound is extremely deep, even after hundreds of hours of playing you still learn new tactics and mind games all the time. And yes: It's about mind games. Especially as a survivor in high-ranked games you have to get into the mind of the killer and try to think three steps ahead (no PoGo-pun intended). And this is unbelievably lots of fun, learning little new tricks to loose the killer and succeeding in using them. The thrill-level of this game is unbeatable. Played hundreds of hours counter-strike (since 1.3) and it was lame compared to this game!

10/10

Update November 2017: The game got even better, developers are extremely active and developing in a fast pace

Awesome game. The Dead by Daylight Team is always in action to steady improve it! I have a lot of fun playing it and it's geting better and better. I'm realy looking forward whats ahead of us and what they'll add in the next couple of years!

Love it !!!!

Nice Job ;)

Эта игра подарила мне реальные эмоции страха и мощную дозу адреналина, сердце бьется как сумасшедшее! Но главное, я стала меньше бояться темноты в реальности, потому что можно сказать уже пережила весь спектр чувств, когда за тобой гонится уродливый маньяк, догоняет тебя и смачно ударяет или распиливает, брызгая кровью на монитор. При этом ты истошно кричишь и страдаешь, а потом маньяк еще тебя на крюк вешает... Классный катарсис и классная игра!

Played this game at launch a lot, then quit until freddy came out, game hasn't changed too much but some stuff has changed for the bettter and worse.... i like the addition of party streamers to help out the bloodpoints for new people.

A $20 game has given me nearly 300 hours of enjoyement, and I'm still hooked.

I've spent $60+ on so-called AAA titles that have bored me within the first 20 hours.

Also, the Devs LISTEN and COMMUNICATE with the community.

I highly recommend giving it a shot.

I love this game and the experience it provides. It's a fun game to play casually, and also a layered challenge if you want to grind competitively, and the devs are taking it in the right direction. I recommend it wholeheartedly.

The only con I can think of (in the current state of the game, early August 2016) is the queuing system for survivors, you can get stuck in a readying loop, but I believe they have introduced analytics within the game to gather data in order to fix this.

Have fun out there!
Queuing up with friends can sometimes take awhile to find a match (1-5 minutes with one friend, 3-10 with two, 5+ with three). Overall a pretty fun game

While the game has had it bugs, I am quite enjoying it. The game is getting better and better and the devs are adding more and more balance to the game and constantly fixing bugs. If you are looking for a game to test your true stealth gaming skills, this is the game for you

It is the first game of its kind.
It got some issues but the developers working on it and holding contact to the community weekly.
Overall its enjoyable to play and it dont regret to have bought it.

Some parts need balancing but it is overall a great game!

I'll keep it short...

The developers behind this game lack the basic knowledge of balancing, Creativity and bug fixing.

If you don't mind frustration while playing PVP games then go ahead.

Edit: They change things nobody ever complained about, They keep adding more gamebreaking bugs and screw this game over and over again, This game takes a step forward and three steps backward.

Edit 2: They seem to be listening to the community more now, But some issues still plague this game, There is also a MAJOR grind wall which is a pain to climb as a new player, I'm 800 hours into this game and I have yet to completely unlock all perks on the killer's side, Survivor's side is easier since the difference between survivors is just their model, While killers have different abilities.

Bought the game, very fun, have 500 hours already. A little repetative and can be a grind, but playing with friends if fun. Once ranks are hidden and lobbies/matchmaking is updated it will be even faster to get into games.

The devs are incompetent. While the gameplay is really fun, i simply cannot recommend the game. Do not buy this game without expecting serious problems going unfixed for large amounts of time, if not forever.

Warning, This game is going to give you jump scares.  It will make you laugh, cry and scream likely all in one match.  :P   

I have played it since beta and there have been changes along the way. Some good some bad and some questionable at times but the game play and challenges have advanced over time.  

There have been many attempts to fix pallets and balance survivors vs killers which will be never ending.  Be prepared for patches and re balance fun once a New DLC is released.

They finally migrated to dedicated servers which helps with some aspects but the lobby cue, matching system is still in need of a rework. In a fast paced game like this you should not have to wait 10 to 20 mins or longer to get in a game.    

The new tome and rift system are a nice addition and give both new and old players new goals and to the game added challenges and goals to achieve.  

The game charges for DLC  which if you do not want to pay full price for you can always wait till sales like the Steam Winter  and other sales events.

Have fun and remember its just a game.  Just like in any community you will come across those that like to stir the pot and those that like to help others.   Overall the game can be fun but at times toxic  attitudes and behavior can make that experience less rewarding.  If you run across button pushers ignore them as they feed on pushing your button.  Do not feed the trolls they are just fine eating their own.   :P

See you in game.  Sage o7

Since updating, matchmaking has become infinitely faster. Searching with a single friend goes pretty fast. You get into danger when when search with 3 or more. Be ready for 5-10 minutes of searching, while potentially dying in two minutes. 

Other than  that I've been greatly enjoying this game! Searching as the killer is super fast, tons of fun on both sides of the game. I recommend it if you like high tension games with lots of hilarity and death.

I really like this game, but the matchmaking in it is so horrible. Single player MM is difficult to get a game and if you're in a lobby with a friend(s), then you might as well not play since it'll be a literal 20-30 minutes before it puts you into a game and even then you're not certain you can play until it counts down. MM needs a huge improvement and some survivor perks are a little OP in my opinion.

Il gioco di per sè è bello non lo consiglio se volete un horror vero e proprio perchè non fà molta paura...
L'unica pecca è che i giocatori che lo popolano sono delle vere merde e appena un killer vede una partita con sopravvissuti a livello alto quitta riportandoci al menù principale... 
Questo rende impossibile giocare questo videogioco.
Un miglioramento potrebbe essere quello che il killer non può uscire dalla lobby, certo basterebbe terminare l'attività ma nessuno ne avrebbe voglia...
